name: framework-starter-template-ts
description: ⚛️ A lightweight, reactive TypeScript framework for building dynamic web interfaces.
author: thednp

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.generate: npm run build:client && NODE_ENV=production vite build --sourcemap=false --ssrManifest .vite/ssr-manifest.json --outDir dist/static && npm run build:server && node prerender --mode=production
scripts.preview: npm run generate && NODE_ENV=production STATIC=true node server --port 5173
